description: Connect AI model plans: Zhipu z.ai (verified), plus Beta plan access for Kimi/Volcengine/Minimax/Aliyun (untested)
commands.coding-plans.manage.zhipu.title: Manage Zhipu z.ai Configuration
commands.coding-plans.manage.kimi.title: Manage Kimi Configuration (Beta)
configuration.title: Coding Plans
Whether Zhipu uses China mainland endpoint (true: mainland, false: overseas)
configuration.coding-plans.kimi.region.d: Whether Kimi uses China mainland endpoint (true: mainland, false: overseas)
configuration.coding-plans.volcengine.re: Whether Volcengine uses China mainland endpoint (true: mainland, false: overseas)
configuration.coding-plans.minimax.regio: Whether Minimax uses China mainland endpoint (true: mainland, false: overseas)
configuration.coding-plans.commitMessage: Language for generated commit messages (auto follows VS Code locale)
Preferred vendor for commit message generation (e.g. zhipu-ai, kimi-ai). Leave empty to always prompt or pick the first available model.
Preferred model id for commit message generation. When set, it takes precedence over modelVendor.
